message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'll sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $80. Let me know if you're open to that.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still think the product is worth more than $80. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really like it!
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm happy to pay $90, which is a fair price for both of us. Let me know what you think.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I still think the product is worth more than $90. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'll offer it to you for $105. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price for both of us.
